T02TD2569E:28a-1: a'arya manydzu shr'i n'a ma sangg'i ti ho ma bi dhi sam gra ha ta n'a ma /
T02TD2569E:28a-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga bsdus pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2569E:28a-4: 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2569E:28a-5: de la dang po sngags pa ni //
T02TD2569E:28a-6: rang lus 'jig kyang gzhan phan brtson //
T02TD2569E:28a-7: rnyed dang bkur sti la ma chags //
T02TD2569E:28a-8: sems can don du sbyin sreg bya //
T02TD2569E:28a-9: dang po sa'i cho ga dang sta gon gyi cho ga byas la /
T02TD2569E:28b-0: yid du @28b 'ong ba'i sa'i char thig btab la /
T02TD2569E:28b-1: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su thag bung khru gang ba /
T02TD2569E:28b-3: kha khyer sor bzhi phyir dor ba /
T02TD2569E:28b-4: de'i steng du sor bzhi ba'i kha khyer gyis bskor ba /
T02TD2569E:28b-5: nang du padma dang rdo rjes mtshan pa /
T02TD2569E:28b-6: byug pa dri zhim po dang /
T02TD2569E:28b-7: me tog dkar pos brgyan pa /
T02TD2569E:28b-8: mtshams su rdo rje tse gsum pa dang //
T02TD2569E:28b-9: ba khyer la ku sha dgram par bya'o //
T02TD2569E:28b-10: shin tu sar pa'i ras kyis g-yogs par bya'o //
T02TD2569E:28b-11: de nas mchod rdzas dang sreg rdzas dang /
T02TD2569E:28b-12: yam shing dang bud shing dang /
T02TD2569E:28b-13: dgang gzar dang blugs gzar rnams bshams te /
T02TD2569E:28b-14: mchod rdzas ni g-yon du gzhag //
T02TD2569E:28b-15: sreg rdzas ni g-yas su gzhag go //
T02TD2569E:28b-16: de nas khrus dang byug pa byas la stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs dang /
T02TD2569E:28b-18: srod la padma'i 'dug stangs kyis kha shar du bltas te blos bsgrub par bya ba de dmigs te /
T02TD2569E:28b-20: de nas lce lag byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2569E:28b-21: skad cig ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi h'um mdzad kyi sbyor bas ra ba dang dr'a ba dang bgegs bskrad par bya'o //
T02TD2569E:28b-22: rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang badzra tsakra bya ba 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum lta bur dmigs te /
T02TD2569E:28b-23: phyag rgya bzhi byas la rang rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyas mchod pa byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2569E:28b-24: thun mong gi mchod pa lnga dang /
T02TD2569E:28b-25: khyad par sgeg mo la sogs pa'i mchod pa brgyad dang /
T02TD2569E:28b-26: mchod pa nyi shus kyang yang dag par mchod de /
T02TD2569E:28b-27: sdom pa gzung ba'i bar du rdzogs par bya'o //
T02TD2569E:28b-28: de nas gshegs su gsol lo //
T02TD2569E:28b-29: de nas bdag nyid kyis rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis sngags //
T02TD2569E:28b-31: zhes bya bas bgegs bsal bar bya'o //
T02TD2569E:28b-32: badzra shi kha re ru ta ma ta zhes bya bas rdo rje rtse mo'i sngags kyis bdag dang thab dang rdzas dang mchod pa rnams bsang bar bya'o //
T02TD2569E:28b-33: de nas bdag nyid 'dod pa'i lhar bskyed de /
T02TD2569E:28b-34: snying ga'i 'od zer gyis ye shes sems dpa' rang dang 'dra ba mdun du spyan drangs la phyag dang mchod pa byas te /
T02TD2569E:28b-35: snying ga'i 'od zer gyis bdag nyid gnyis su med par byas te phyag rgya chen po bzhis rgyas btab la dbang bskur ba yang blang ngo //
T02TD2569E:29a-0: de nas snying ga'i 'od zer gyis thab khung mi dmigs par byas la mum las dkar ba dang 'tsher ba dang rnam pa thams @29a * //
T02TD2569E:29a-1: cad dang ldan pa'i shin tu che ba'i thab bskyed do //
T02TD2569E:29a-2: de yang phyi rol gzhal yas khang rgyan dang ldan pa'i nang du chud pa'o //
T02TD2569E:29a-3: de yang 'o ma can gyi shing gi bud shing ngam /
T02TD2569E:29a-4: dgon pa'i ba lang gi lci bas thab bas cung zad dma' ba tsam gyi bud shing brtsigs la rgyun bzhag gi me 'am /
T02TD2569E:29a-5: yon bdag dka' thub la dga' ba'i khyim nas blangs pa'i me yam shing gis spar te /
T02TD2569E:29a-7: badzra dzva la ram zhes me'i snying po yang brjod do /
T02TD2569E:29a-8: de nas me'i spra brtag ste /
T02TD2569E:29a-9: dgang gzar dang blugs gzar la rang gi chos kyi yi ger bkod de /
T02TD2569E:29a-10: aom w'a g'i shva ri mum /
T02TD2569E:29a-12: shin tu gang ba'i mar gyis dgang blugs dang sreg blugs sbyin no //
T02TD2569E:29a-13: de nas rtags bzang po mthong ba dang /
T02TD2569E:29a-14: de nas me thab tu ram sum mdo ris mtshan can la /
T02TD2569E:29a-16: de'i steng du bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor /
T02TD2569E:29a-18: de'i steng du ram dkar po las me lha zhi ba dung dang ku mu da ltar dkar ba /
T02TD2569E:29a-19: mig gnyis pa ral ba'i thor tshugs dang bcas pa phyag bzhi pa skyabs sbyin dang /
T02TD2569E:29a-22: gundhe rnams g-yas dang g-yon na 'dzin pa'o //
T02TD2569E:29a-23: mchod phyir thogs dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2569E:29a-24: rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa /
T02TD2569E:29a-25: rin po ches dbu brgyan pa /
T02TD2569E:29a-26: ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'dzag cing shin tu zhi ba'o //
T02TD2569E:29a-28: sprul pa'i me bde bar byas te /
T02TD2569E:29a-29: lag pa g-yas skyabs sbyin du bzhag la /
T02TD2569E:29a-30: mthe bo srin lag gi rtsar g-yab cing /
T02TD2569E:29a-31: ae hye hi bha ga b'an aagni bha ba aam ku sha dza: snying ga'i 'od zer gyis spyan drangs la phyag btsal ba dang /
T02TD2569E:29a-32: mchod pa dang bstod pa bya ste /
T02TD2569E:29a-33: snying ga'i 'od zer gyis gnyis su med par bya'o //
T02TD2569E:29a-34: de nas phyag rgya bzhis gdab par bya ste /
T02TD2569E:29a-35: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya dang /
T02TD2569E:29a-36: badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya bas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
T02TD2569E:29a-37: de nas rdzas thams cad bsags nas snying ga'i 'od zer dang ye shes kyi bdud rtsis rdzas thams cad byin gyis brlabs te /
T02TD2569E:29a-38: dgang gzar dang blugs gzar thogs te /
T02TD2569E:29b-0: byams pa'i sems kyis aagna ye bha ba che ge mo'i sdig pa sarba p'a pam da ha na badzr'a ya sh'antim ku ru ye sv'a h'a zhes pas yam shing ni 'od kyi dkyil @29b 'khor du'o //
T02TD2569E:29b-1: mar me la sogs pa zhu ba'i rdzas thams cad ni zhal cung zad gdangs par dbul lo //
T02TD2569E:29b-2: de nas til dad 'bras chan la sogs pa ni phyag tu'o //
T02TD2569E:29b-4: dri dang byug pa ni thugs kar ro //
T02TD2569E:29b-5: ku sha dang d'ur ba'i myu gu ni 'od kyi dkyil du'o //
T02TD2569E:29b-8: de nas sdig pa sbyar bar 'dod na lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil du til nag po la sdig pa'i gzugs su bya ste /
T02TD2569E:29b-9: 'od zer gyis sdig pa bsdus te /
T02TD2569E:29b-10: bskul tshig dang bcas pas ji srid bde ba tha mthong gi bar du bsreg par bya'o //
T02TD2569E:29b-11: nad zhi bar byed pa rnams kyis ni snying ga'i bya nag po la 'od zer bsdus pa'i sbyor ba byas nas bsdus te /
T02TD2569E:29b-12: bskul tshig dang bcas pas bsregs na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2569E:29b-13: yang na snying ga'i 'od zer gyis bsreg bya legs par bskul te /
T02TD2569E:29b-14: de'i 'od zer gyis nad blangs la bdud rtsi'i chus bkrus te bskul tshig dang bcas pas bsreg go //
T02TD2569E:29b-15: tshe spel ba la sogs pa yang tshul 'di nyid kyis 'grub par bya'o //
T02TD2569E:29b-16: de nas zhabs bsil phul la bstod de /
T02TD2569E:29b-17: las dang rjes su mthun pa'i phrin las bcol la /
T02TD2569E:29b-18: me rang gi gzugs kyis de nyid du bzhugs su gsol lo //
T02TD2569E:29b-19: de nas las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis thab dang rdzas bsangs te /
T02TD2569E:29b-20: me tog thab tu bor la de lta bu'i thugs kar padma dang zla ba'i gdan bskyed la /
T02TD2569E:29b-21: de'i steng du mum dmar skya de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phro 'du dad bcas pa /
T02TD2569E:29b-22: de yongs su gyur pa las btsun 'jam dpal sku mdog zla ba nya ba lta bu rdo rje'i skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'o //
T02TD2569E:29b-23: g-yas ral gri dang mda' bsnams pa //
T02TD2569E:29b-24: g-yon po ti dang gzhu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2569E:29b-25: sangs rgyas lnga yis dbu brgyan pa /
T02TD2569E:29b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa' dang khro bo dang khro mo'i tshigs rnams 'dus shing 'phro ba ste /
T02TD2569E:29b-27: rdo rje dang rin po che dang padma dang /
T02TD2569E:29b-28: sna tshogs rdo rje dang snying ga dang /
T02TD2569E:29b-31: spyi bo rnams su bkod pa'i yum bzhi'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab po //
T02TD2569E:29b-32: manydzu shr'i sa ma ya stvam ham /
T02TD2569E:29b-34: de nas bdun gyi nam mkha'i phyogs su hr'i: dang aa las zla ba'i gdan bskyed de /
T02TD2569E:30a-1: gyis ye shes sems dpa' dgug pa dang dbang du bya ba'i bar du bya'o //
T02TD2569E:30a-2: de nas mngon sum dang 'dra bar bltas te /
T02TD2569E:30a-3: phyag bya ba sngon du 'gro bas mchod pa dang bstod pa byas te /
T02TD2569E:30a-4: snying ga'i 'od zer gyis thab kyi gzugs dang gnyis su med par bsre /
T02TD2569E:30a-5: de nas rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcas te /
T02TD2569E:30a-6: sa ma ya dza: bsdu bar bya'o //
T02TD2569E:30a-7: de nas phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya'o //
T02TD2569E:30a-8: de nas aom w'a g'i shva ri mum manydzu shr'i h'um /
T02TD2569E:30a-9: sarba p'a bam d'a ha na badzr'a ya che ge mo sh'antim ku ru ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2569E:30a-10: zhes bya bas yam shing dang mar la sogs pa thams cad dang cho ga gong mas dbul lo //
T02TD2569E:30a-11: sdig pa sbyang ba dang nad sbyang pa yang cho ga gong mas so //
T02TD2569E:30a-12: de nas gzi brjid bskyed pa'i phyir mar gyi sreg blugs sbyin par bya'o //
T02TD2569E:30a-13: tshul des brgya rtsa la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02TD2569E:30a-15: yang dag par mchod pa dang /
T02TD2569E:30a-17: de nas dge ba bsngo ste /
T02TD2569E:30a-18: las dang rjes su mthun pa'i smon lam btab ste /
T02TD2569E:30a-19: aom khyod kyis sems can don kun mdzad //
T02TD2569E:30a-20: ces pa la sogs pas ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2569E:30a-21: dam tshig sems dpa' bdag la bsdu'o //
T02TD2569E:30a-22: de nas rdzas thams cad bsangs te me rang gi gzugs su bsam par byas te /
T02TD2569E:30a-23: cho ga gong ma nyid kyis sreg blugs lhag ma sbyin no //
T02TD2569E:30a-24: de nas mchod pa dang bstod pa dang /
T02TD2569E:30a-27: aom ae hye hi zhes gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2569E:30a-28: dam tshig pa bdag la bsdu'o //
T02TD2569E:30a-29: aom aa k'a ro mu kham zhes bya ba la sogs pas sreg rdzas kyi lhag ma bsdus te /
T02TD2569E:30a-30: 'byung po thams cad la gtor ma sbyin no //
T02TD2569E:30a-31: chog nyams pa dang ma tshang ba kha bskang ba'i phyir yi ge brgya ba brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2569E:30a-32: sbyin sreg las rnams gsal bsdus pas //
T02TD2569E:30a-33: bdag gis dge ba gang thob des //
T02TD2569E:30a-34: ma lus sdug bsngal grol gyur te //
T02TD2569E:30a-35: 'gro kun 'jam dpal thob par shog / slob dpon 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyis mdzad pa /
T02TD2569E:30a-36: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i tshul gyi spyod pa bsdus pa las /
T02TD2569E:30a-37: mtshan yang dag par brjod pa'i spyin sreg gi cho ga bsdus pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2569E:30a-39: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su badzra dang /
T02TD2569E:30b-0: bod kyi lo ts'a ba chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te @30b gtan la phab pa'o /
